EmailTemplate.name: MTO Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Review Required: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Honeywell Aerospace products. Currently your Request for Quotation is under review. The item you have requested is considered a special order and our response may be extended as we determine the appropriate source for this request.
A representative will contact you within five (5) days for additional information regarding your request or any required actions.
{!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c} has been assigned to your request and is visible on the subject line of this email message.
Thank you.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support
